channel.title: [Delta] Block animations
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I know this is a community of geniuses and one of you will surely be able to help me, so on we go
Whilst i was adding general graardor to my server (correct animations 100% sure) i noticed the block animation was not working so i checked the code i had implemented and that checked out, at which point i realised NONE of my npcs block animations were working i spent awhile looking for problems but alas none were found so i have come here with a wish for one of you to help me.
There are no compilation errors.
P.s General graardor has working walk (7058), stand (7059),die (7062) and punch emotes working(7060), if anyone can help me with a random heal with this emote i would like that also(7063).
7061==block
If you need anything else just ask.

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

search for this then: TotalExp = (double) (4 * hitDiff);
above it should be if (UseBow) {
Above both of those add this

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 0) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2745) { server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].GetBlockEmote(); server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Thanks again phat is there anything i can do for you? i feel guilty receiving so much help without helping you!

Errm GetNPCBlockAnim isnt in my client.java i do ctrl+F and paste it in and it isnt found

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Delete that yes and add search for this in client.java: GetNPCBlockAnim
and replace the WHOLE line with server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].GetBlockEmote();

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

public int GetNPCBlockAnim(int id) {
switch (id) {
case 50: // dragons
case 53:
case 54:
case 55:
return 89;
case 1961:
return 1927;
case 1115:
return 7061;
case 221:
case 110:
return 129;
case 1119:
return 7061;

  default:
     return 1834;

  }

}

so here?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

find where it’s executed and replace it by calling the new method

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Thank you i will just test it now!

Where do i call the blocking and do i delete this part?

public int GetNPCBlockAnim(int id) {
	switch (id) {
	case 50: // dragons
	case 53:
	case 54:
	case 55:
		return 89;
	case 1961:
		return 1927;
	case 1115:
     		return 7061;
	case 221:
	case 110:
		return 129;
            case 1119:
		return 7061;

	default:
		return 1834;

	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Block animations
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Had the same problem that way doesn’t work
use this in npc.java

public int GetBlockEmote() { if(npcType == 90 || npcType == 91) { return 261; } if(npcType == 103) { return 124; } if(npcType == 127) { return 186; } if(npcType == 82) { return 65; } if(npcType == 2627) { return 2622; } if(npcType == 1850) { return 1842; } if(npcType == 2629 || npcType == 2738) { return 2626; } if(npcType == 1030 || npcType == 1033) { return 1081; } if(npcType == 81) { //return 5850; } if(npcType == 2892 || npcType == 2804) { return 2869; } if(npcType == 9) { return 1156; } if(npcType == 100) { return 312; } if(npcType == 96) { return 76; } if(npcType == 87 || npcType == 88) { return 139; } if(npcType == 2881 || npcType == 2882 || npcType == 2883) { return 2852; } if(npcType == 19) { return 410; } if(npcType == 1472) { return 65; } if(npcType == 112 || npcType == 117) { return 129; } if(npcType == 1338) { return 1340; } if(npcType == 1610) { return 1519; } if(npcType == 1616) { return 1547; } if(npcType == 1637) { return 1585; } if(npcType == 1624) { return 1555; } if(npcType == 1615) { return 1537; } if(npcType == 1154) { return 1186; } if(npcType == 1155) { return 1186; } if(npcType == 2783) { return 2730; } if(npcType == 50 || npcType == 55 || npcType == 53 || npcType == 54 || npcType == 941) { return 89; } if(npcType == 1625) { return 1596; } if(npcType == 1459) { return 1403; } if(npcType == 2630) { return 2626; } if(npcType == 2631) { return 2629; } if(npcType == 2741) { return 2635; } if(npcType == 2743) { return 2645; } if(npcType == 2746) { return 2635; } if(npcType == 2591 || npcType == 2604 || npcType == 2610) { return 2606; } return npcType != 1613 ? 424 : 65; }

Then where you call the blocking add this
